item.title: AI-Based OCT Spotted Cardiovascular Risk
item.description: AI-based OCT image analysis of thin-cap fibroatheromas captures ‘the complete picture, not just the angiographic hotspot.’ Medscape Medical News

item.title: Anxiety, Depression More Common in Adolescents With Cancer
item.description: As cancer incidence rises in adolescents and young adults, so does concern about their elevated mental health-related symptoms. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Infantile Hemangioma Visits, Topical Tx Increasing in the US
item.description: A 10-year US study reports an increase in infantile hemangioma visits over a decade, with topical beta-blocker prescribing rising sharply. Medscape Me...
